price: Atasema: Nyinyi hamkukaa huko duniani ila kidogo, laiti ingeli kuwa mnajua.
arabic: قَٰلَ إِن لَّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗاۖ لَّوۡ أَنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: Basi Mwenyezi Mungu atawaambia: Hamkuishi duniani ila muda mchache tu. Na lau ingeli kuwa mnajua malipo ya ukafiri na uasi na kwamba starehe ya duniani ni chache mngeli amini na mkat'ii.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla in labith'tum illā qalīlan law annakum kuntum taʿlamūna
